title: Column icons don't show up when connecting to Derby database
description: When connecting to a Derby database in the Data Explorer view, the column icons are not visible.
OB: When creating a dataset after setting up a Data Source with a connection to a Derby database, the column icons are missing.
EB: When creating a dataset after setting up a Data Source with a connection to a Derby database, the column icons should be visible.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Create a new project. 
2. Create a new report. 
3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source and connect to a Derby database with the following details: 
   - Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver 
   - Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui 
   - User Name: root 
   - Password: root 
4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset. 
5. In the Edit Data Set window, select Query. 
6.
